common_0190_rival_03:
And that huge building with the Poké Ball on it
is our school![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0190_rival_04:
It’s gonna be so great having you in the same
class, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0190_rival_05a:
Right? I can’t wait to get back. We’re gonna get
to learn so much...and battle so, so, SO much![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0190_rival_05b:
Don’t think of it as schoolwork—think of it as
tons of chances to learn about Pokémon battling![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0190_rival_01: Isn’t it awesome what you can see from up here?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0190_rival_08:
Mountains! Forests! Grasslands! Beautiful nature
stuff, as far as the eye can see![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0190_rival_09:
And you know what’s waiting for you all over
these natural spaces? Tons of Pokémon![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0190_rival_10:
Consider this me officially telling you:
welcome to Paldea![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0190_rival_06:
But anyway, like you can see, it’s kind of a hike
to get to school from here.[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0190_rival_07:
Let’s make it to Los Platos for starters.
That’s right on the way![VAR 0114(0004)]
